Conversation Assignments

Assign Conversation

POST

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

conversations

/

{conversation\_id}

/

assignments

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request POST \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/conversations/{conversation_id}/assignments \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "assignee_id": 1,
  "team_id": 1
}'
```

200

401

404

Copy

```
{
  "id": 123,
  "access_token": "<string>",
  "account_id": 123,
  "available_name": "<string>",
  "avatar_url": "<string>",
  "confirmed": true,
  "display_name": "<string>",
  "message_signature": "<string>",
  "email": "<string>",
  "hmac_identifier": "<string>",
  "inviter_id": 123,
  "name": "<string>",
  "provider": "<string>",
  "pubsub_token": "<string>",
  "role": "agent",
  "ui_settings": {},
  "uid": "<string>",
  "type": "<string>",
  "custom_attributes": {},
  "accounts": [\
    {\
      "id": 123,\
      "name": "<string>",\
      "status": "<string>",\
      "active_at": "2023-11-07T05:31:56Z",\
      "role": "administrator",\
      "permissions": [\
        "<string>"\
      ],\
      "availability": "<string>",\
      "availability_status": "<string>",\
      "auto_offline": true,\
      "custom_role_id": 123,\
      "custom_role": {}\
    }\
  ]
}
```

#### Authorizations

userApiKeyagentBotApiKey

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversation-assignments/assign-conversation#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversation-assignments/assign-conversation#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversation-assignments/assign-conversation#parameter-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the conversation

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversation-assignments/assign-conversation#body-assignee-id)

assignee\_id

number

Id of the assignee user

Example:

`1`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversation-assignments/assign-conversation#body-team-id)

team\_id

number

Id of the team. If the assignee\_id is present, this param would be ignored

Example:

`1`
